column1: Norin is a Longbeards Dwarves and the father of Farin (video game character). When Farin was born he did live in the Iron Hills. It is unknown if he was originally born in Lonely Mountain
column2: or if he returned after the Battle of the Five Armies. Although he doesnt make an actual appearance in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column3: he is mentioned in the http://www.warinthenorth.com/the-game/heroes/backstory#dwarfAnchor backstory of Farin.

column1: Category:The Lord of the Rings: War in the North characters
